column5: A super article you have in the May issue of Sentier Chasse Peche. Congrats on that. And BTW, your French is improving immensely.
Roy I really enjoy Justins reports. He never has had a bad one yet.  Real nice job Justin,once again. As for the ,what ever langwish yer speak,n.the pics tell the story.LOL

Hey Guys,  Thanks for the congrats - much appreciated!!  Sentier is a great magazine to write for, even though I can't read a single word when the issues come out..  And the English version of that very article will be in TJ's next issue of the newsletter...  As for reports, only made it out on the ice once this season But will be uncovering the boat this weekend, and getting her good and wet - for the next 7 months!!  Here's wishing you all a good season...  Justin
Kudos on the article Justin Great shots also
